meta_title: Vibration Analysis: The Ultimate 2025 Guide to PdM Success
meta_description: Go beyond the basics of vibration analysis. Our in-depth guide covers diagnostics, CMMS integration, and how to build a world-class predictive maintenance
title: Vibration Analysis: From Predictive Data to Prescriptive Action in 2025

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Vibration Analysis: From Predictive Data to Prescriptive Action in 2025

image_prompt: A photorealistic, high-quality image set in a clean, modern manufacturing facility. A female maintenance manager of color with her hair in a net and wearing safety glasses and a high-visibility vest is standing next to a large industrial electric motor. She is holding a ruggedized tablet that displays a colorful vibration analysis FFT spectrum graph. A male colleague of a different ethnicity, wearing a hard hat and safety glasses, points to a wireless vibration sensor mounted on the motor's bearing housing, and they are discussing the data on the tablet. The background is slightly blurred, showing other machinery and good lighting, emphasizing the two professionals and the technology. The image should be bright, professional, and convey a sense of expertise and collaboration. There should be no text on the image.
